html:
4.27.20  8:59 am   What even is a "question"?

      nothing

4.27.20  8:47 am   am i stupid

      everything's stupid. that's just science

4.27.20  8:29 am   i think i may have stuck myself in a rut, by accident.

i believe you are experienced on the topic. any tips?

      make a song about it. and if the song sounds like it came from a rut, it will only add to the vivid sense of realism

4.27.20  8:27 am   will 2020 end of us all as a race?

      we'll see

4.27.20  8:21 am   What inspirational quote do you live by?

      i prefer for quotes to be based on life, rather than life based on quotes

4.27.20  8:13 am   do you have a fear of tomatoes?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

4.27.20  7:52 am   hey bill, you are cool

      we'll see about that

4.27.20  6:23 am   Do you like using your chicken drumsticks for your drums when you're hungry

      no

4.27.20  6:09 am   Are you going to make more videos?

      yes, the ones i've made so far are pretty much just a warm up

4.27.20  6:03 am   when are you gonna make a new video

      you're acting like i'm only gonna make 1 video. i'll tell you one thing for sure, videos are way too awesome to make just 1

4.27.20  6:00 am   favorite tea flavor!

      i have yet to find a tea that has any flavor. as soon as i do, i can assure you that one will be my instant favorite

4.27.20  5:23 am   how to type?

      just keep pressing the type button

4.27.20  4:58 am   do you believe in the golden era of bill wurtz

      hell yeah. it is readily approaching

4.27.20  4:36 am   they called WW1 "the war to end all wars." do you think anyone foresaw WW2 happening?

      no

4.27.20  4:26 am   Are you drinking enough water?

      yes

4.27.20  4:14 am   Where did I leave my keys?

      possibly in the door

4.27.20  4:01 am   would you say a house is just a bowling alley withoiut any pins?

      no

4.27.20  3:52 am   What main song do you sing when bored 

      never bored. too frightened

4.27.20  3:38 am   Do you take compliments?

      i will try

4.27.20  3:33 am   What is your motivation?

      hills, and valleys

4.27.20  3:26 am   is there a scale that you use in La de da de da de da de day oh?

     not really, but it is pretty securely in the key of G, so you're going to hear a lot of the notes (not in this order) G, A, B, C, D, E, and to a lesser extent F# and maybe a hint of D#. with occasional other guest appearences

      i don't understand music, do musicians always use scales when writing melodies?

     only if the sound of the notes fails to give them any feeling

4.27.20  3:20 am   What do you think about doomsday clock

      each doomsday clock is actually just a countdown to the next doomsday clock. this is great news for people who like doomsday clocks

4.27.20  3:10 am   What is the color of the sky?

      scientists are trying to figure out

4.27.20  3:09 am   What rhymes with orange?

      cordless

4.27.20  3:05 am   I feel like I can't accomplish my dreams because  things change so fast and so often. I didn't get an apartment months ago because I was worried my life situation would change and THEN IT DID. How do you make progress towards your goals even with the knowledge that no matter how much you plan, you can't expect the unexpected? 

      you could learn to......... dance

4.27.20  3:02 am   what the heck is a weekend

      could be some sort of social construct

4.27.20  2:52 am   Are you trained in music?

     yes, i've been training myself, consistently deeper throughout my entire life

      Where did you learn to improvise and compose the way you do?

     at home, and in the work place

     I just listened to your Giant Steps and I'm just baffled at ur skillz. (with a z)

4.27.20  2:47 am   why do you keep telling people "i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes"

      that would be, for example, if my first instinct was to say 'no' but then suddenly was able to reconsider and see it differently

4.27.20  2:39 am   what is the most beautiful fruit

      pineapple

4.27.20  2:10 am   How does it feel to exist?

      spectacularly peculiar

4.27.20  2:06 am   did you make it to the south pole by nightfall?

      i must have made it there at some point, because the video got made and it does include the south pole

4.27.20  1:59 am   Whenever I think of ideas in the shower, I remember what most of them are when I'm out of the shower, but I don't know how to develop them. How do I access the shower state of mind while outside the shower?

      you can't, but you can always just take another shower. another thing that sometimes works is to go for a walk without any phone or recording device. it's risky business and it's kind of like flying without a net. because your memory will have to be good. but that might be an interesting trick. i tried that near the end of writing 'long long journey', and i must have came up with 6 different endings, each time while trying to remember the previous

4.27.20  1:30 am   Is time travel possible 

      that is the only kind of travel that is possible

4.27.20  1:27 am   Not a question, but your music really inspires me and helped me get out of a really tough depressive slump. Thanks for everything you do, please keep creating!

      holy railroad junction you are very friendly

4.27.20  1:26 am   are you good?

      we'll see about that

4.27.20  1:13 am   you are amazing

      we'll see about that

      time and space

      gold bullion

      no

      no

4.26.20  11:53 pm   Rate your sleep schedule in terms of healthiness from 1 to 10

      7

4.26.20  11:52 pm   I've got a situation that you may or may not be able to advise me on. You've mentioned that the tune for "might quit" came from a dream, and I think someone else once asked something here about the same thing. Something kinda similar has happened to me; there have been two or three times I hear a supposedly unfamiliar tune in a dream, but when I wake up I suddenly realize it's basically the same as another song I already know (maybe with a tiny note changed or something). What would you recommend doing in these situations?

      get some breakfast

4.26.20  11:38 pm   meant to include this on my last question but what are your thoughts on books as an art form in general?

      amazing, especially if computers don't exist yet

4.26.20  11:37 pm   whats your favorite year

      2020

4.26.20  11:09 pm   What is your favorite type of pizza

      round, and flat. like the earth

     i personally wouldn't do it

     Also, gotta say, love your work.

     that's kind of you

      i have always been expecting it, but it never seems to arrive

      monsters

      could maybe use witchcraft
